title: Decision Option Filter
description: Filters are used to specify criteria for option selection by topic or theme. The most common filter mechanism is by the tags that are associated with an option. In general the option filter selects a subset of option from the overall inventory.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

name.title: Name
name.description: Filter name. Property has the semantic of schema.org's 'name' property defined on http://schema.org/Thing

filterType.title: Decision Option Filter Type
filterType.description: An indicator to identify the handler of the filter expression to which any parameters will be provided. Parameters will be provided as additional properties in schemas that extend Decision Option Filter.
